bill.title: Constitution; amend Section 112 to allow single-family, owner-occupied real property that is not a primary residence to be Class I.
bill.description: A Concurrent Resolution Proposing An Amendment To Section 112 Of The Mississippi Constitution Of 1890 To Provide That If The Primary Residence Of A Person Is Single-family, Owner-occupied Residential Real Property Located In This State And The Person Owns Other Single-family, Owner-occupied, Residential Real Property In This State, The Primary Residence Of The Person And One Other Owner-occupied Residential Real Property Of The Person's Choosing May Be Classified As Class I; To Provide That If The Property Chosen Is For Sale, That Property May Retain Its Class I Classification Only For 12 Months After The Date It Is Put On Sale.
